title: Google Assistant in Chrome for Android now offers to change compromised passwords automatically
content:
At its I/O developer conference last year, Google announced a new Assistant-powered feature for Chrome to help users easily change compromised passwords. description: Chrome for Android is finally getting an Assistant-powered feature that offers to automatically change your compromised passwords.
